Articles.Content:
This is just an idea I've been thinking about for a bit. I think it would be really awesome to have some kind of volumetrics system for the rings that come with Kopernicus. I'm imagining something simple like the old 2D clouds puffs that EVE can do, plus some debris scatters. Has this been done before? I don't have the know-how to make this myself, but I'd love to see this get made.

Edit: Sorry, I just realized I put this in the wrong topic! This is meant to be KSP 1 mod discussions, not KSP 2

Edited June 28 by rheaunderstars

On 6/28/2024 at 11:55 AM, rheaunderstars said:

Edit: Sorry, I just realized I put this in the wrong topic! This is meant to be KSP 1 mod discussions, not KSP 2

So moved.    Next time just report your post and what needs done.    We’ll get to it much faster that way.
